meanings.definition: To freely transfer the possession of something to someone else.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys giving her toys to her little sister.
meanings.sent2: He is giving his old clothes to charity.
meanings.sent3: The magician was giving away free tickets to his show.
meanings.sent4: The sun was giving its warmth to the flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The teacher was giving out stickers to the students for their good behavior.

meanings.definition: The act of providing or supplying something.
meanings.sent1: Her giving to the food drive helped many families in need.
meanings.sent2: The giving of gifts during the holidays brings joy to many.
meanings.sent3: The giving of awards at the ceremony made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The giving of instructions was clear and easy to follow.
meanings.sent5: The giving of feedback is important for improvement.

meanings.definition: Showing kindness or generosity towards others.
meanings.sent1: She has a giving heart and always helps those in need.
meanings.sent2: The giving nature of the community is truly heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: The giving spirit of the holiday season is contagious.
meanings.sent4: His giving attitude brightens the day of everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The giving personality of the volunteer made a difference in the shelter.
